Title: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to develop and maintain a community residence opportunities waitlist
Summary: Requires the office for people with developmental disabilities to develop and maintain a community residence opportunities waitlist which include the names and contact information of all individuals seeking placement in a community residence.
LawCode: Add ยง16.15, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to requiring the office for people with developmental disabilities to develop and maintain a community residence opportunities waitlist
